trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes and deserializes SOAP methods.
trans-unit.target: 表示集合的属性对象用于控制如何<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化和反序列化 SOAP 方法。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Creating a SoapAttributes is part of a process that overrides the default way the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes class instances.
trans-unit.target: 创建 SoapAttributes 是重写默认的进程的一部分方式<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化类实例。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL that has an inaccessible source.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你想要序列化创建从 dll 导出的源不可访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class, you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类，你可以增加或其他方式控制如何序列化对象。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: The members of the SoapAttributes class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization.
trans-unit.target: SoapAttributes 类的成员直接对应于一系列控制序列化的属性类。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property must be set to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize the property value as an encoded SOAP attribute.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>，该编辑器可以通过指示重写的字段或属性的序列化<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化编码的 SOAP 特性的属性值。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of attributes that control encoded SOAP serialization, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 用于控制编码的 SOAP 序列化的属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制编码 SOAP 序列化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more details about adding an instance of the SoapAttributes class to an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息将 SoapAttributes 类的实例添加到的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类概述。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: For each member or class instance whose serialization is being overridden, you must create a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 对于重写其序列化每个成员或类实例，你必须创建新的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Set the properties for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> as appropriate to the member or object, then add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>为适合于成员或对象，然后将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>的实例</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes></xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>的属性

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> class using the specified custom type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref>类使用指定的自定义类型。

trans-unit.source: Any object that implements the <xref href="System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider"></xref> interface, such as the <xref:System.Type> class.
trans-unit.target: 实现任何对象<xref href="System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider"></xref>接口，如<xref:System.Type>类。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref>重写。

trans-unit.source: By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果没有特性应用到一个公共字段或公共读/写属性，会将它序列化为的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also instruct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize a member as an encoded SOAP XML attribute by applying a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to the field or property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指示<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>若要将成员序列化为编码 SOAP XML 特性，通过应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>到字段或属性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must be created with an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> in order to serialize an object as an encoded SOAP XML stream.) The SoapAttribute property allows you to override the serialization controlled by applying a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to the member.
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>必须用来创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>以便将对象序列化编码 SOAP XML 流的形式。)</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> SoapAttribute 属性允许你重写通过应用控制的序列化<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>给的成员。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more details on this process, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关此过程的更多详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类概述。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref> that overrides the behavior of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> when the member is serialized.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"> </xref>可重写的行为<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>成员序列化时。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 XML 元素或属性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of a member can be set by applying a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> attribute to the member.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过应用设置成员的默认值<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>属性成员。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If the member is being serialized as an encoded SOAP message, you can change the default value by creating a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, setting its <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A> property, and setting the SoapDefaultValue property to the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员被序列化为编码的 SOAP 消息，你可以通过创建新更改默认值<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>，设置其<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A>属性，以及将 SoapDefaultValue 属性设置为该对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类概述。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 XML 元素或属性的默认值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref>重写。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> is used to control the serialization of a class member as an XML element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>用于控制视为 XML 元素的类成员序列化。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapElement property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> to override the serialization of a class member as an XML element by creating a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: SoapElement 属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>以通过创建一个新的重写类成员的序列化的 XML 元素形式<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>并将其分配给属性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Then add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 然后将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, then construct an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.
trans-unit.target: 创建对<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>，然后对<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping></xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>构造</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides></xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类概述。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"> </xref>重写。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a SOAP enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个对象，指定如何<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化 SOAP 枚举。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> is used to control the serialization of an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>用于控制的序列化枚举成员。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapEnum property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> to override the serialization of such a member.
trans-unit.target: SoapEnum 属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>重写此类成员的序列化。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类概述。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，指定如何<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化枚举成员。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a public field or property as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化的公共字段或属性作为编码的 SOAP XML。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有公共字段和公共读/写属性进行序列化<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，每个公共字段或属性的值仍保持为 XML 元素或 XML 文档中的 XML 特性。

trans-unit.source: To override the default serialization of a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and set its SoapIgnore property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重写的默认序列化的字段或属性，请创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，并将其 SoapIgnore 属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the object to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore and the name of the field or property to ignore.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>方法将对象添加到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>并指定包含的字段或属性，若要忽略的对象的类型和字段或属性，若要忽略的名称。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>应用于字段或属性，忽略的字段或属性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>

trans-unit.source: However you can override that behavior by creating a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, setting its SoapIgnore property to `false`, and adding it to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property and the name of the field or property.
trans-unit.target: 但是通过创建重写该行为<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，将其 SoapIgnore 属性设置为`false`，并将其添加到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>，指定包含的字段或属性的对象的类型和字段或属性的名称。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>必须序列化的字段或属性; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that instructs the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> how to serialize an object type into encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个对象，指示<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>如何序列化到的对象类型编码的 SOAP XML。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> can be used to control the XML stream generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>可用于控制<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>所生成的 XML 流</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapType property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> to control the schema for the XML that is generated when a class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: SoapType 属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>对架构进行控制的序列化类时，将生成 XML。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> that either overrides a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> applied to a class declaration, or is applied to a class declaration.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"> </xref>它或者重写<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref>应用于类声明中，或应用于类声明。
